name: StayCool
description:
Make it trough the level without reaching max temperature.

Use the pickups to move faster or cooldown.  Avoid the lava.

Everytime you move your temp will increase.

Only 5 levels atm.

Use the frostmode to convert lava into ice for a few sec. While on the ice you will cooldown.

Made for the Level Up Circle: Beginner Jam #1

Controls:

A, D or arrows to move.

Space to jump.

ESC to restart the current level.

Left shift to use energy and get a speedboost.

Credits:

sfxr.me - sound fx

beepbox.co - background music
